snippet: A 21-year-old sea lion named Holly was found beaten to death in her enclosure on Friday.
abstract: German police search for suspects in beating death of sea lion named Holly at Dortmund Zoo; hole was discovered in fence near cage where animal’s body was found and autopsy reports smashed skull and missing teeth.
lead_paragraph: A 21-year-old sea lion named Holly was found beaten to death in her enclosure on Friday.

headline.main: Germany: Police Investigate Killing of a Sea Lion at the Dortmund Zoo
headline.print_headline: Europe; Germany: Police Investigate Killing of a Sea Lion at the Dortmund Zoo
